text: Korean Olympics may refer to: * 1988 Summer Olympics, held in Seoul, South Korea * 2018 Winter Olympics, held in Pyeongchang, South Korea * Korea at the Olympics (IOC code: COR), the unified joint united Koreas at the Olympics * South Korea at the Olympics (IOC code: KOR) the Republic of Korea * North Korea at the Olympics (IOC code: PRK) the Democratic People's Republic of Korea ==See also== * Korean Paralympics (disambiguation)
title: Korean Olympics
